message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe is worth more than its actual price tag. For a limited time, I am offering it to you for $150. This is a great opportunity to experience the quality and benefits of our product at an exclusive price. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'd like to try to get a better deal. Can you meet me in the middle at $130?
